paper_abstract: In this paper, we introduce a general overview of Falcon-AO: a practical ontology matching system with acceptable to good performance and a number of remarkable features. Furthermore, Falcon-AO is one of the best systems in all kinds of tests in the latest three years' OAEI campaigns. Falcon-AO is written in Java, and is open source. (c) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Falcon-AO: A practical ontology matching system
